= Plinian Core Flat =


== Introduction ==


The Plinian Core Flat was originally designed as a basis to develop species data sheets that can be shown in websites. Currently, it is a simplified version of a conceptual hierarchical schema and is semantically more enriched and detailed.
The last version of the schema can be downloaded from here:[http://www.gbif.es/plinian/data/media/plinian_2.0.xsd_comprimido_como_.zip Plinian_2.0.xsd_comprimido_como_.zip] 
The schema can be checked out here: [http://www.gbif.es/plinian/lib/exe/fetch.php?id=Inicio&cache=cache&media=poster_plinian_core_v2.pdf poster_plinian_core_v2.pdf]





== Versions ==

These are the Plinian Core Flat versions:

  * Version 2.2.1: http://www.pliniancore.org/test/pl_corev2.2.1.xsd

  * Version 2.2.2: http://www.pliniancore.org/test/pl_corev2.2.2.xsd

  * Version 2.2.3: http://www.pliniancore.org/test/pl_corev2.2.3.xsd (not available)

  * Version 2.2.4: http://www.pliniancore.org/test/pl_corev2.2.4.xsd (not available)

  * [PlinianCoreFlat2_3 Plinian Core Flat2.3]
